relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
the national society of leadership and success is highly recommended.

the davis hall is an unusual building that was most likely built since the beginning of the university (not sure what year). the building itself is mysterious with broken windows, yet the university still utilizes the building for offices.
the food is good enough to eat and not make you sick.
if you attend class you will do well at this university. bleed purple!
tarleton state is a unique university located in stephenville, texas, which is approximately sixty miles southwest of fort worth, texas. there are around 10,000 students that attend this university.
pageTitle: Tarleton State University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {371334=The Purple Poo evolved from the TTS/TTP spirit organizations. The still-secret organization gathers to make Poo Say signs each Monday night. The Poo Say signs appear on campus every Tuesday morning and occasionally comment on campus political life and student life. The Poo Say signs are nailed to the trees on campus and most are designed to promote school spirit. Purple Poo members appear in public dressed in costume to conceal their identity. Many members un-mask at the Leadership and Service Awards Ceremony each April while others choose to have their pictures appear in the Grassburr. At commencement, graduating members will pass a purple pig to the university president as they pass across the stage., 367252=Has amazing professors. Has a lot of country people and cowboys. May not be the best for people from the city., 78348=Apply early for the scholarship deadline, Dec. 1. Also, choose to be in a Learning Community., 200950=Beginning in Fall 2012, new Tarleton Texans emerged on campus a week before classes began (Aug. 19-26). Students moved into their residence halls on Aug. 19 and experienced a week full of activities designed to help them meet their academic and social objectives. The week also guided students through the resources available to adjust to Tarleton's environment and culture. Please take advantage of this week. It was very helpful., 435279=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students If you are planning on majoring in agriculture, Tarleton is perfect for you. Tarleton specializes in the agricultural studies and being in the middle of a country town, they definitely know what they are talking about. Tarleton also has one of the best barrel racing teams in Texas, so if you're a rodeo kind of person it's great. Even if you're not into the whole rodeo scene, there is a spot for you a Tarleton. I'm an English major and I love my classes and the whole environment at Tarleton. There is a great fine arts system at Tarleton as well, so theatre majors, music majors, and art majors are welcome and at home. Over all, Tarleton is a great school for everyone. Tips for prospective students If you plan on attending Tarleton and living on campus you are going to be required to purchase a meal plan. You may think you're going to eat three times a day in the dining hall, but trust me, you don't have time to do so. I'm on the 10 meals per week plan and I have never used all of them in one week. It's cheaper to just get the 10 meal plan and some ramen for your dorm room for those days you miss dinner. Bang for the buck
